original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sakabaḷena mukhena byāharanti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū sa kabaḷena mukhena byāharanti pe
na sa kabaḷena mukhena byāharissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca sakabaḷena mukhena byāharati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca sa kabaḷena mukhena byāharati āpatti dukkaṭassa
